content.question: Which of the following contextual factors most directly contributed to the decline in confidence in the federal government in the 1970s?

choices.label: A combination of economic challenges, political scandals, and foreign policy crises
A belief that the government no longer served the interests of the people
A growing clash between conservatives and liberals over policy
A sharp increase in immigration to the United States

content.answer: A combination of economic challenges, political scandals, and foreign policy crises
